Package Panels

Class Assets

java.lang.Object
Panels.Assets
public class Assets extends Object
The Assets class represents a collection of fonts, colors, and images used in the application.

    • loadImage

      public BufferedImage loadImage(String strFileName)
      Loads an image from the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      strFileName - the file path of the image to load
      Returns:
      the loaded image as a BufferedImage object
